mapper.select: SELECT REL_ID, NAME, PARENT_REL, START_ENT, END_ENT, OPTION, COLOR, GROUP_NAME, LABELS, CONCAT(NAME, ' (', LABELS, ') ') as JSTREENAME FROM RELATION WHERE group_name = #{groupName}

SELECT A.CONTENT, count(A.CONTENT) as count, A.TYPEOPT FROM ( SELECT a2.CONTENT as content, if (a.START_POINT = a2.ANN_ID,'start','end') as TYPEOPT FROM ANNOTATION_NEW a inner join RECORD_NEW r on a.RECORD_ID = r.RECORD_ID and a.RECORD_SEQ = r.RECORD_SEQ and r.GROUP_NAME = #{groupName} inner join RELATION rel on a.NAME = rel.NAME and rel.REL_ID in
${relId}
INNER JOIN ANNOTATION_NEW a3 ON a3.RECORD_ID = a.RECORD_ID AND a3.RECORD_SEQ = a.RECORD_SEQ
AND a3.CONTENT = #{startRel} AND a3.ANN_ID = a.START_POINT
AND a3.CONTENT = #{endRel} AND a3.ANN_ID = a.END_POINT
INNER JOIN ANNOTATION_NEW a2 on
a.END_POINT = a2.ANN_ID
a.START_POINT = a2.ANN_ID
a.START_POINT = a2.ANN_ID
a.END_POINT = a2.ANN_ID
AND a2.RECORD_ID = a.RECORD_ID AND a2.RECORD_SEQ = a.RECORD_SEQ WHERE 1=1
AND a2.CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%')
ORDER BY a2.content DESC ) A
AND A.TYPEOPT = #{type}
GROUP BY A.CONTENT, A.TYPEOPT ORDER BY count desc

SELECT DOC_ID, SUBJECT, REG_ID FROM DOCUMENT_NEW WHERE 1=1
AND DOC_ID not in
${list.docId}
ORDER BY SUBJECT desc
